summary.title: Summary
summary.content: Software developer with emphasis on backend and strong logic in solving algorithmic problems. Passionate about learning new technologies and applying them in innovative projects. I consider myself a person with great ability to adapt, responsible, self-taught and committed to teamwork.

jobs.description: Supported continuous software improvement by applying best development practices, code optimization, and bug fixing.
details: Implemented an intelligent chatbot integrated with n8n to automate processes and improve customer service.
Provided hardware support, preventive/corrective maintenance, and technical documentation.
Supported inventory management, performing system adjustments, equipment control, and internal logistics improvements.

jobs.description: Developed software solutions focused on secure, stable, and scalable platforms, implementing modern interfaces with Vue.js and React Native with Node.js backend functions.
details: Managed REST APIs, NoSQL databases, and collaborated on requirements analysis.
Performe maintenance and support for the web platform, ensuring availability.
Deployed in Linux environments, configured SSH/SFTP services, and performed basic server administration.

jobs.description: Developed data implementation and consumption from a REST API, building dynamic and responsive interfaces using React.
details: Participated in system architecture design and microservices integration.
Optimized data flow between digital ecosystem services.
Implemented version control with Git/Bitbucket and controlled deployments.
Optimized infrastructure, monitored services, and supported production applications.

jobs.description: Implementation and data consumption from REST APIs using Angular and TypeScript, building responsive and modular interfaces.
details: Worked with Laravel/PHP and MySQL to create optimized endpoints, models, and queries.
Integrated microservices and improved system data flow.
Used AWS services (Amplify, S3, Lambda) for deployments, monitoring, and technical support.
